@womanwalkingawire in any social media sharing of items made with this pattern i genuinely enjoy seeing what you have made message me with any questions at any time of day i usually respond within 24 hours enjoy abbreviations materials chain- chain 4mm crochet hook chsp- chain space worsted weight yarn slip_stitch- slip_stitch yarn needle single_crochet- single_crochet half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet treble_crochet- treble_crochet fphdc- front post half_double_crochet fpdc- front post double_crochet round- round magic_ring- magic_ring/magic_ring fo- fasten_off notes this pattern is written as a solid one-color square you can of course make color changes at any new round this pattern is compatible with my maryjane alien head and night owl granny square patterns chains between stitches do not count as stitches they are chain spaces chsp all my granny square patterns begin with a magic_ring if you prefer to begin with a chain circle sew it closed and tighten it down as much as possible before moving on to the 2nd round to keep all the subsequent rounds tight and even i do not recommend using this method though the repeat * to * instructions are the total amount of times the stitches are worked and repeated for example if it says *5 double_crochet in each chsp* repeat from * to * 3x you would do this 3 times total and have 15 double_crochet 1 video links part 1 https //youtu be/k8lqwlkwnmw part 2 https //youtu be/b2zfd8h1lug part 3 https //youtu be/cqrxjvsdxxg round 1 into magic_ring chain 3 and 11 double_crochet close magic_ring and slip_stitch to beginning chain 3 to join 12 sts round 2 chain 3 & fpdc around same st *double_crochet into & fpdc around next st* repeat from * to * 11x slip_stitch to beginning chain 3 to join 24 sts round 3 chain 3 double_crochet into the same st *fpdc around next st 2 double_crochet into next st* repeat from * to * 11x slip_stitch to beginning ch3 to join 36 sts round 4 chain 3 2 double_crochet into next st fpdc around next st *double_crochet into next st 2 double_crochet into next st fpdc around next st* repeat from * to * 11x slip_stitch into beginning chain 3 to join 48 sts 2 round 5 note the ** is a repeat inside of a repeat indicator ch3 double_crochet into the next 2 sts fpdc around next st *double_crochet into the next 3 sts double_crochet into & fpdc around next st* repeat from * to * 2x *double_crochet into next 3 sts fpdc around next st **double_crochet into the next 3 sts double_crochet & fpdc around next st** repeat from ** to ** 2x *
